title: How can we assess the quality of a problem? - Quora

response.answer_text: Q: How can we assess the quality of a problem? A: from its degree of (ie. Yes and No):- validity. ie. if it is not valid then it wont be a problemusability, applicabilityreliability, consistencyheight, leveldepth, corescope, parameters, coverage, span, bandwidthpurpose, focal point, focus, directionvolatility, movement,pattern. format, connection, structuretiming, impactsignificance, consequenceetc.etc.etc.
